newsitem.title: USA: Pulaski sees $9.2 mln Q3 restructure charge.
newsitem.headline: Pulaski sees $9.2 mln Q3 restructure charge.

text.p: Pulaski Furniture Corp said Monday that it will take a restructuring pre-tax charge of certain assets and inventories amounting to $9.2 million in its third quarter results.

Included in the non-recurring, non-cash writeoff are the elimination of the company's domestic seating line and related inventories, the divestiture of its Craftique unit, and a manufacturing reevaluation of all its major manufacturing facilities, it said.
The purpose of the reevaluation is to make sure that each factory has the correct products for its manufacturing capabilities, a company official said.
It said it expects to release its third quarter results on August 1.
